title: The Last Battle: Dragonmaster, Book Three (The Dragonmaster Trilogy)
features: Hal Kailas has grown into a battle-hardened Dragonmaster, but his old enemies have returned, and even with all his skill and the help of the dragons, he may not be able to triumph in the ultimate battle for the fate of the world. By the author of Storm of Wings and Knighthood of the Dragon. Original. 20,000 first printing.
